item.title: Create a footnote
item.description: Create footnote This snippet demonstrates the ability to create new footnotes by referencing the document body. Note, you will need to find the position index in the body before to insert a footnote. Leave a comment index.js /** * */ /** * Runs the sample. * Insert a footnote to specific position */ function run() { const reply = createFootnoteWithText_('Aha!', 1); console.log(JSON.stringify(reply, null, ' ')); } /** * Create a footnote with the text * * @param {string} text * @param {number} bodyIndex * @param {string} id * @returns Result of batch updates or an issue reply */ function createFootnoteWithText_( text, bodyIndex, id = DocumentApp.
